caption.title: Study area and sampling sites distribution.
caption.p: a Huating, in Gansu; b Zhouqu, in Gansu; c Ningqiang, in Shaanxi; d Fengxian, in Shaanxi; e Longxian, in Shaanxi; f Liuba, in Shaanxi; g Maoping, in Shaanxi; h Foping, in Shaanxi; i Taibai, in Shaanxi; j Ningshan, in Shaanxi; k Yingpan, in Shaanxi; l Zhen’an, in Shaanxi; m Fengzhen, in Shaanxi; n Zhenping, in Shaanxi; o Xunyang, in Shaanxi; p Huaxian, in Shaanxi; q Qingchuan, in Sichuan; r Wuxi, in Chongqing; s Lushi, in Henan. 1 Lingchuan, in Shanxi; 2 Xiuwu, in Henan; 3 Jinzhai, in Anhui; 4 Lin’an, in Zhejiang.
